thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: St Patrick's Day Trip
thread.title_full: St Patrick's Day Trip - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Bluetipp
title: St Patrick's Day Trip
text:
Stayed here recently with my husband. We stayed in a king sized room on the 11th floor. The room was nice and clean with a huge bed. The room was a good size for a New York room with plenty of storage and a safe. I wouldn't be overly confident with the safe as it wasn't bolted to the wall!! The bathroom was also a good size for what we needed it for. Fresh towels every day. There was security in the lobby and it felt very safe. There is a lovely coffee shop in the lobby and a little shop, which was handy for water and snacks.
We had breakfast in the restaurant one morning and it was not good. I couldn't recommend anyone to eat there, the bagel I picked up was mouldy. Staff were very helpful and sorry when I pointed this out. The hotel location could not be better, a one minute walk will put you in the middle of time square.
Overall I was very happy with the hotel and would certainly stay here again.
